data.text: @DudeJezz @AJWins2 Alex himself seems to fit the bill.
@AJWins2 Some people just don’t want to know the truth.

@AJWins2 No one is buying your traitorous bullshit outside of mentally ill cultists.
#TraitorsToDemocracy
@AJWins2 Sure because the Alex Jones was right account on Twitter says so

@AJWins2 He really does not know his stuff. He has said a lot of complete nonsense going all the way back to the Y2K debacle. He basically just spews lies and sells merch and people buy into it all, making him very rich. He doesn’t have to be accountable for anything he says.
@AJWins2 What? He was wrong. About all of that. Most especially the invasion. He was saying there was absolutely no way it was going to happen, that it was all just CIA/MSM fear mongering propaganda.

@AJWins2 Man said Obama was a demon from hell like a real one, said Hillary Clinton was running a pedophile ring in a pizza parlor (pizzagate), said the sandy hook shooting was faked. And you take him seriously??? LMFAO
@AJWins2 Even a broken clock is correct 2 times a day, and has a better record of being right than his 3 out of 20000 conspiracies.
